description.zh-cn: 已故朝鲜劳动党总书记金正日的次子，现任领导人金正恩的兄长。据传因其个性以及患有内分泌疾病，在接班人竞争中被弟弟金正恩取代。目前担任烽火组首长。
description.en: The second son of the late General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong-il, and the elder brother of the current leader Kim Jong-un. It is rumored that he was replaced by his younger brother Kim Jong-un in the succession race due to his personality and an endocrine disorder. He currently serves as the head of the Ponghwasan Group.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜前最高领导人，曾任朝鲜劳动党总书记。他是金正哲、金正恩、金与正、金正男和金雪松的父亲。
description.en: The former supreme leader of North Korea, who served as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. He is the father of Kim Jong-chul, Kim Jong-un, Kim Yo-jong, Kim Jong-nam, and Kim Sol-song.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的妻子，在日朝鲜人，归国后成为万寿台艺术团舞蹈演员。她是金正哲、金正恩和金与正的母亲。
description.en: The wife of Kim Jong-il, a Zainichi Korean who returned to North Korea and became a dancer for the Mansudae Art Troupe. She is the mother of Kim Jong-chul, Kim Jong-un, and Kim Yo-jong.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜政治人物，金正日的女儿，金正哲的同母妹妹。
description.en: A North Korean politician, daughter of Kim Jong-il, and the full younger sister of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 现任朝鲜最高领导人，金正日的儿子，金正哲的同母弟弟。他取代了其兄金正哲成为接班人。
description.en: The current supreme leader of North Korea, son of Kim Jong-il, and the full younger brother of Kim Jong-chul. He replaced his brother Kim Jong-chul as the successor.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的长子，金正哲的异母哥哥。
description.en: The eldest son of Kim Jong-il and the elder half-brother of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜女演员，金正日的妻子，金正男的母亲。
description.en: A North Korean actress, wife of Kim Jong-il, and mother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 金正日的女儿，金正哲的异母姐姐。
description.en: Daughter of Kim Jong-il and the elder half-sister of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 位于瑞士伯尔尼的一所国际学校，金正哲曾在此留学。
description.en: An international school located in Bern, Switzerland, where Kim Jong-chul studied.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜的一个组织，据称由高官子弟组成，金正哲担任其首长。
description.en: A North Korean organization, reportedly composed of the children of high-ranking officials, led by Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的首都，金正哲的出生地。
description.en: The capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the birthplace of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 日本城市，金正哲母亲高容姬的出生地。
description.en: A city in Japan, the birthplace of Kim Jong-chul's mother, Ko Yong-hui.

description.zh-cn: 英国摇滚和蓝调吉他手、歌手和作曲家。金正哲是其忠实歌迷，曾多次出国观看其演唱会。
description.en: An English rock and blues guitarist, singer, and songwriter. Kim Jong-chul is an avid fan and has traveled abroad multiple times to attend his concerts.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的创建者及第一代最高领导人，金正日的父亲，金正哲的祖父。
description.en: The founder and first supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, father of Kim Jong-il, and grandfather of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜独立运动家，金日成的第一任妻子，金正日的母亲，金正哲的祖母。
description.en: A Korean independence activist, the first wife of Kim Il Sung, mother of Kim Jong-il, and grandmother of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 高容姬的父亲，金正哲的外祖父。
description.en: The father of Ko Yong-hui and the maternal grandfather of Kim Jong-chul.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是金正日的次子。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the second son of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是高容姬的儿子。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the son of Ko Yong-hui.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是金与正的同母兄长。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the full elder brother of Kim Yo-jong.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是金正恩的同母兄长。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the full elder brother of Kim Jong-un.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是金正男的异母弟弟。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the younger half-brother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是金雪松的异母弟弟。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is the younger half-brother of Kim Sol-song.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲出生于平壤市。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul was born in Pyongyang.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲曾在瑞士伯尔尼国际学校留学。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul studied at the International School of Berne in Switzerland.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是朝鲜劳动党党员。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is a member of the Workers' Party of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲担任烽火组首长。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul serves as the head of the Ponghwasan Group.

description.zh-cn: 金正恩最终取代了金正哲，成为金正日的接班人。
description.en: Kim Jong-un ultimately replaced Kim Jong-chul to become the successor to Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 高容姬是金正日的妻子。
description.en: Ko Yong-hui was the wife of Kim Jong-il.

description.zh-cn: 成惠琳是金正日的妻子，金正男的母亲。
description.en: Song Hye-rim was the wife of Kim Jong-il and the mother of Kim Jong-nam.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金日成的儿子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il was the son of Kim Il Sung.

description.zh-cn: 金正日是金正淑的儿子。
description.en: Kim Jong-il was the son of Kim Jong-suk.

description.zh-cn: 高容姬出生于日本大阪市。
description.en: Ko Yong-hui was born in Osaka, Japan.

description.zh-cn: 高容姬是高景太的女儿。
description.en: Ko Yong-hui was the daughter of Ko Kyong-thak.

description.zh-cn: 金正男是成惠琳的儿子。
description.en: Kim Jong-nam was the son of Song Hye-rim.

description.zh-cn: 金正哲是埃里克·克莱普顿的歌迷，曾多次专程前往德国、新加坡和英国观看其演唱会。
description.en: Kim Jong-chul is a fan of Eric Clapton and has specifically traveled to Germany, Singapore, and the United Kingdom to attend his concerts.

description.zh-cn: 金正淑是金日成的妻子。
description.en: Kim Jong-suk was the wife of Kim Il Sung.
